actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code in order to apply to National Guard technician certain retention and overtime work benefits now extended to Federal employees, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that a National Guard technician who is (1) employed for 10 or more years in a position which requires, as a condition of employment, National Guard membership; (2) who is involuntarily separated under honorable conditions and (3) who meets Civil Service Commission physical standards; shall be retained in technician employment by the adjunct general of the jurisdiction concerned. States that no National Guard technician may be required to wear a military uniform while performing technician duties.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code in order to apply to National Guard technician certain retention and overtime work benefits now extended to Federal employees, and for other purposes.
